title: Get all CAR MODEL Nodes
user_story:
As an API consumer \
I want to be able to load all car models\
So I can compare and analyze them without loading each individually
description:
# **Request**

* method: `GET`
* url path: `/car-models` 

# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (200)
* a simple JSON with an array of all car model nodes:
  * id: integer
  * name: string

**Unhappy path**

* n.a. → when there are no car models an empty array is returned → same status code (200)

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* other core properties, like `built_from` and `built_to` 
* meta information, like created\_at or updated\_at
* auth / security
* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
* relationships with other nodes (e.g. brands or car model variants)
* specific ordering or configurable ordering → the database decides
* pagination

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business logic)**

* all existing car models are returned as a list
* an empty list is returned when there exist no car models in the database

**Quality Gates**

* Unit+Integration tests (Jest) are extended (100% coverage combined)
* Behavior tests (Cucumber) are added (100% coverage)
* OpenAPI spec is extended
  * schema is still valid
* Bruno collection is extended
